lines.text:
[to Scottie]
Where do you live? Haven't you got a home?
Do you want to live with me?
Hurray! We'll have lots of fun!

[singing]
We'll play soldiers, dressed in red/You'll get shot and fall down dead/We'll play soldiers, of the king/We'll play pirates, bad and bold/You'll walk the plank and I'll steal gold/Fifteen men on a dead man's chest/Yo ho ho ho ho ho ho/We'll play pirates, bad and bold!
Grandma! Look what I found? Can I keep him?
No! Now you get! Shoo! Go on, get!
[Scottie runs out, leaving mud on the floor, Grandma passes a broom to Kitten]
Now you clean up this floor!

[crying]
She'll be sorry she didn't let me keep him!
